definition: a woman's close-fitting foundation garment, put a girdle on or around
details:
noun
- a woman's close-fitting foundation garment
= synonyms: corset
- a band of material around the waist that strengthens a skirt or trousers
= synonyms: cincture, sash, waistband, waistcloth
- an encircling or ringlike structure
verb
- put a girdle on or around
= synonyms: gird
- cut a girdle around so as to kill by interrupting the circulation of water and nutrients
= example: cut a girdle around so as to kill by interrupting the circulation of water and nutrients
= synonyms: deaden
